data.text: Ɗa nui ɠaaɠalesu ma fufiligi zu,
Mazɔlɔɔ kona waagilagi (1.000) ɠa è ɠaazu,
Ɗa nuɓusɛiti zɛʋɛzu, eɠɛ ɲiimɛni goi nɔ,
È gá-vaaɠaaza golaiti kpein pua ɠakala,
Mazɔlɔɔ gá-voloiti ta ɲɛɛlɛzu ga ɗa-yiiɠaawanai,
Gá-ɠonagi liegɔi ɠa ga kona ʋuulɔfela (70),
Ɓɛ ɠa a ɗa-yiiɠaawanai zuzɔligi ɠwɛɛ?
Gi ɠala ga gi gá-voloiti gaalu ga pagɔ,
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, ɠale ma gi ʋɔ. Ɗa yɛsu nɛkɛsu, eyɛsu yeelɛ?
Geelaa ɠa laona nɔ feya, ɗa-wooɠɛɠiladai lɛ ga giye,
Koozunɛ voloiti fe gi ya, gá-ʋoluɠula voloiti potogi zu,
Ɗa-ɠɛɛwotii ɠula kɛlɛma gi ʋɛ, gɛi gi ga ɗa-wotiɠɛ nuiti,
Maliɠii gá-ƓALAGI ná-wɔinlai ɠɛ gi pɛ ba!
